thread.section_title: Centauro Rent a Car opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Centauro Rent a Car | centauro.net
thread.title: Sabine Collyn
thread.title_full: Centauro Rent a Car evaluado por Sabine Collyn

author: Sabine Collyn
title: Sabine Collyn
text:
Perfect! Total service was really perfect. Shuttle service from airport with a very friendly driver. At the rental station, competent and also very friendly people speaking different languages! No additional insurances. Very clean and new car.
Returned the car without any problem! Again a very fast and friendly shuttle service to the airport.
I can really recommend to hire a car with Centauro!
Thanks to the whole team!
